author: TV Guide
title: Jared Fogle Makes Payouts to His Victims
text: Jared Fogle Makes Payouts to His Victims Jared Fogle's victims are getting some justice.According to TMZ... Comment   at 8:13 PM Updated at 11:11 PM   at 8:13 PM Updated at 11:11 PM Â» Social News Jared Fogle 's victims are getting some justice. According to TMZ , the former Subway spokesperson paid out a million dollars to 10 people who were minors when Fogle either secretly photographed them or paid to rape them. Each victim got $100,000 as part of his plea deal . Four additional victims will also be receiving a payout. In addition, Fogle will register as a sex offender, get treatment for sexual disorders, and will serve at least five years in prison. Fogle will be formally sentenced to prison next month. His wife of five years, Katie Fogle, has filed for divorce. The couple has two children. WATCH: Jared Fogle pleads guilty to child pornography charges Other Links From TVGuide.com
